main.name: Reva Kulkarni
intros: ðŸ‘‹ I am Reva Kulkarni, an electrical âš¡ engineer. I am interested in a challenging position as a entry level electrical engineer.
My interests include nanotechnology, fiber optics, and circuit design, but I am open-minded about various fields to pursue in my career. I work well within teams to collaborate on projects.
Since high school I have held positions in retail, education, and the semiconductor industry.
Enjoy being part of a team, as well and thrive in high-pressure and challenging working environments.
I am finishing up my college in December, 2023 and currently live in San Antonio, TX.
Currently, I am working as a Math Tutor for Mathenesium for K-12 grades. I learned a lot from this job including being patient, empathetic and a good listener..
sideIntros: I enjoy long hikes in San Antonio. I love to travel with my parents. I also love our dog Charlie.
I am a big foodie and enjoy all different cuisines but I love my moms meals the most!
